name: CakePHP - Cookbook - Makeup II v2
description:
I tried to revamp my old userstyle, to let it fit the completely overhauled website at http://book.cakephp.org. This style is dedicated to all the nightowls who like to keep their melatonin-level as high as possible, without fiddling with the monitor settings. If your brain chemistry really reacts? Please ask a competent person working at Max-Planck-Institute, MIT or the DARPA.

The colours are wild. You're best to keep with the vanilla old design.
additional_info:
* Sep 29, 2018: Astounded that userstyle still is usable. The designers of that site surely knew that they revamped the site to the state upon when it will remain like that for a while. Removed the cheesy glow from the content-menu and fixed the class path on top of articles (descname and descclassname).

* Jun 23, 2016: Some corrections regarding the new site design. Nevertheless I couldn't change the headlines in the left side navigation. They are added dynamically by the site.

* re-release
  Look Ma, I maked found your old recipe for mintzchockscakeys, threw it away and rewrote the complete list of ingredients...eh yo Mama, yes I know how to write for sure!
-- JackLeEmmerdeur  Mon, 14th April 2014 High Noon
